exceptions.tactic: intros T n m u1 u2 mk_matrix.
intros T' n m u1 u2 mk_matrix.
intros T' n' m u1 u2 mk_matrix.
intros T' n' m' u1 u2 mk_matrix.
intros T' n' m' u1' u2 mk_matrix.
intros T' n' m' u1' u2' mk_matrix.
intros H i j H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type m, n : nat u1, u2 : nat -> nat -> T H : forall i j : nat, (i < m)%nat -> (j < n)%nat -> u1 i j = u2 i j Unable to unify "(?M2440 = ?M2441 -> forall i j : nat, coeff_mat ?M2439 ?M2440 i j = coeff_mat ?M2439 ?M2441 i j) /\\ ((forall i j : nat, coeff_mat ?M2439 ?M2440 i j = coeff_mat ?M2439 ?M2441 i j) -> ?M2440 = ?M2441)" with "mk_matrix m n u1 = mk_matrix m n u2".

original: intros T n m u1 u2 mk_matrix. split. - intros H i j H1 H2. apply coeff_mat_ext. + apply mk_matrix_bij. + intros i j H3 H4. apply H. * auto. * auto. - intros H. intros i j H1 H2. apply coeff_mat_ext_aux. + rewrite <- H. apply mk_matrix_bij. + intros i' j' H3 H4. apply H. * auto. * auto.
